headline: About me
title: Passionate and Versatile
text: When I started 10 years ago as a Front-End Developer, it was the beginning of HTML5, CSS3 and RWD. Now, I can do more with Modern CSS, Modern JS, JS Frameworks to build apps.
I also have a great ability to adapt my scope. Project management by being freelance for 5 years. UI/UX consulting by collaborating with Product Managers and Designers.
